items.name: MetaMask
items.description_ch: MetaMask 是一个加密钱包，供用户使用浏览器扩展程序或移动应用程序管理数字资产。它具有密钥库、钱包和交换功能。
items.description_en: MetaMask is a crypto wallet for users to manage digital assets with a browser extension or mobile app. It features a key vault, wallet, and exchange.

items.name: Coinbase Wallet
items.description_ch: Coinbase Wallet 是一款自我托管的移动加密货币钱包和 Web3 DApp 浏览器。
items.description_en: Coinbase Wallet is a self-custody mobile cryptocurrency wallet and Web3 DApp browser.

items.name: Trust Wallet
items.description_ch: Trust Wallet是由币安开发和管理的去中心化数字货币钱包。用户可以通过浏览器扩展程序或移动应用程序管理数字资产。它还支持 Web3 DApp 浏览器和质押。
items.description_en: Trust Wallet is a decentralized crypto wallet developed and managed by Binance for users to manage digital assets with a browser extension or mobile app. It also supports Web3 DApp browser and staking.

items.name: Stargate
items.description_ch: Stargate 是一种跨链流动性转移协议，允许用户和 dapps 以资本高效的方式在链之间转移原生资产。它还提供流动性挖矿和质押等功能。
items.description_en: Stargate is a cross-chain liquidity transfer protocol that lets users and dapps transfer native assets between chains in a capital-efficient manner. It also provides additional functions such as liquidity farming and staking.

items.name: Synapse
items.description_ch: Synapse Protocol是一个去中心化的跨链平台。支持资产的跨链转移、数字资产的兑换、流动性池和质押等功能。
items.description_en: Synapse Protocol is a decentralized cross-chain platform that features assets cross-chain transfer, digital assets swapping, liquidity pool and staking.

items.name: Hop Protocol
items.description_ch: Hop Protocol是一个跨链协议，实现在不同区块链之间安全、快速、低成本地转移和转换数字资产。同时支持流动性挖矿。
items.description_en: Hop Protocol is a cross-chain protocol that enables safe, fast and low-cost transfer and conversion of digital assets between different blockchains. It also supports liquidity mining.

items.name: Binance Bridge
items.description_ch: Binance Bridge是一个由Binance开发的支持多链的、高速的、安全的、低手续费的跨链桥接协议。通过Binance.com，用户可以先存入代币，然后提现到目标区块链。
items.description_en: Binance Bridge is a multi-chain, high-speed, secure, and low-fee cross-chain bridging protocol developed by Binance. Through Binance.com, users can first deposit tokens and then withdraw them to the destination blockchain.

items.name: Celer cBridge
items.description_ch: Celer cBridge是Celer Network推出的跨链桥接器，支持用户在不同区块链之间转移包括代币和NFT在内的多种数字资产，同时支持流动性挖矿。
items.description_en: Celer cBridge is a cross-chain bridge launched by Celer Network, which supports users to transfer various digital assets, including tokens and NFT, between different blockchains, and supports liquidity mining at the same time.

items.name: Coinbase Exchange
items.description_ch: Coinbase Exchange 具有高吞吐量 API，可将用户连接到任何受监管的加密现货交易所的最深流动性池。
items.description_en: Coinbase Exchange has high throughput APIs that connect users to the deepest liquidity pools of any regulated crypto spot exchange.

items.name: Binance
items.description_ch: Binance是一个结合了数字技术和金融的交易所。它具有一系列产品组合，包括交易、教育等。
items.description_en: Binance is an exchange that combines digital technology and finance. It features a portfolio of offerings, including trading, education, and more.

items.name: Kraken
items.description_ch: Kraken 是一个加密货币交易所，提供 BTC、ETH 和 40 多种其他数字资产之间的现货和期货交易。
items.description_en: Kraken is a crypto exchange providing spot and futures trading between BTC, ETH and 40+ other digital assets.

items.name: Bybit
items.description_ch: Bybit 成立于英属维尔京群岛，是发展最快的加密货币衍生品交易所之一，拥有超过一百万的注册用户。
items.description_en: Founded in the British Virgin Islands, Bybit is one of the fastest-growing crypto derivatives exchanges, with more than a million registered users.

items.name: OKX
items.description_ch: OKX，前身为 OKEx，是一种加密货币和衍生品交易所，支持现货和衍生品等各种工具的交易。
items.description_en: OKX, formerly known as OKEx, is a crypto and derivatives exchange that enables trading of various instruments, such as spot and derivative.

items.name: Huobi
items.description_ch: 火币全球站是一家全球区块链资产金融服务提供商，包括交易所、交易、钱包和存储。
items.description_en: Huobi Global is a global blockchain assets financial services provider, including exchange, trade, wallet, and storage.

items.name: Pancakeswap
items.description_ch: PancakeSwap是一个基于BSC的DEX，提供了一个 AMM，允许用户交易和兑换 DeFi 代币。同时拥有流动性挖矿、质押挖矿、最高25倍的永续合约、跨链桥等功能。它拥有数百万用户和数十亿 TVL。
items.description_en: PancakeSwap is a DEX based on BSC, provides an AMM, allowing users to trade and swap DeFi tokens. It also features liquidity mining, staking, perpetual contracts up to 25x, and cross-chain bridges. It hosts millions of users and billions of TVL.

items.name: SunSwap
items.description_ch: SunSwap 是一种基于 TRON 的去中心化交易所和流动性池协议，用于自动提供流动性以及所有人都可以访问的开放金融市场。
items.description_en: SunSwap is a TRON-based decentralized exchange and liquidity pool protocol for automated liquidity provision and an open financial market accessible to all.

items.name: Sushiswap
items.description_ch: SushiSwap 是一种 P2P DEX，允许用户交换代币、提供流动性等。它提供多链 AMM、跨链兑换和流动性挖矿。
items.description_en: SushiSwap is a P2P DEX that allows users to swap tokens, provide liquidity, and more. It offers multichain AMM, cross-chain swapping and liquidity farming.

items.name: Uniswap
items.description_ch: Uniswap 是在以太坊区块链上运行的最大的 DEX。它允许世界任何地方的用户在没有中介的情况下交易加密货币。基于其高效的AMM，它具有集中的流动性、灵活的费率和范围订单的特点。
items.description_en: Uniswap is the largest DEX operating on the Ethereum blockchain. It allows users anywhere in the world to trade crypto without an intermediary. Based on its efficient AMM, it features centralized liquidity, flexible rates and range orders.

items.name: Kine Protocol
items.description_ch: Kine Protocol 是一个基于流动性池的去中心化衍生品交易市场。该平台向交易者提供了零滑点的执行功能，有保证的流动性，质押挖矿，以及最高 100 倍杠杆的全仓永续合约。
items.description_en: Kine Protocol is a decentralized derivatives trading market based on a liquidity pool. The platform provides traders with zero-slippage execution, guaranteed liquidity, staking, and cross-margin perpetual contracts with leverage up to 100x.

items.name: GMX
items.description_ch: GMX 是一个Arbitrum上的去中心化的永续合约交易所，用户可以在这里以高达 50 倍的杠杆率交易 BTC、ETH、AVAX、USDC 和其他顶级加密货币。它支持质押挖矿和流动性挖矿。
items.description_en: GMX is a decentralized perpetual exchange on Arbitrum, where users can trade BTC, ETH, AVAX, USDC, and other top cryptocurrencies with up to 50x leverage. It also supports staking and liquidity farming.

items.name: dYdX
items.description_ch: dYdX 是领先的 DEX，其使命是构建开放、安全和强大的金融产品。它运行在以太坊上经过审计的智能合约上。支持最高20倍杠杆的永续合约、超低交易费。
items.description_en: dYdX is a leading DEX created with the mission to build open, secure, and powerful financial products. It runs on audited smart contracts on Ethereum. Perpetual contracts with leverage up to 20 times and ultra-low transaction fees are supported.

items.name: Curve Finance
items.description_ch: Curve是一个以稳定币为基础的去中心化交易平台，旨在提供高效、低成本的稳定币交易服务，并为用户提供高度的资本效率。其资产池稳定、交易低成本、流动性高效、流动性挖矿和锁定收益可观等特点，使其成为TVL最大的DEX。
items.description_en: Curve is a stablecoin-based decentralized trading platform designed to provide efficient and low-cost stablecoin trading services and provide users with a high degree of capital efficiency. Its stable asset pool, low-cost transactions, high-efficiency liquidity, and considerable liquidity mining and locking returns make it the largest DEX in TVL.

items.name: Balancer
items.description_ch: Balancer 是以太坊上的自动化投资组合管理器和交易平台。它可以让您将资产投入使用并获得最佳交易价格。它具有交易、流动性挖矿、锁定挖矿、闪电贷等功能。
items.description_en: Balancer is an automated portfolio manager and trading platform on Ethereum. It lets you to put your assets to work and get the best trading prices. It has functions such as trading, liquidity mining, locking, and flash loans.

items.name: Arrakis Finance
items.description_ch: Arrakis 是一种社区拥有的协议，可提供自动化的流动性管理。基于 Uniswap V3 构建，为用户创造深度流动性。该平台提供的主要功能包括交易、流动性挖矿、质押挖矿和合成资产等。
items.description_en: Arrakis is a community-owned protocol that offers automated liquidity management. Built on Uniswap V3, it creates deep liquidity for users. It features trading, liquidity mining, staking and synthetic assets, etc.

items.name: Velodrome
items.description_ch: 具有基于 Solidly 的革命性的新 AMM 的交易和流动性市场在 Optimism 上推出。它提供杠杆交易、流动性挖矿和交易挖矿。
items.description_en: Trading and Liquidity Marketplace with a revolutionary new AMM based on Solidly launched on Optimism. It offers leveraged trading, liquidity farming and trading farming.

items.name: Parallel
items.description_ch: Parallel Finance 是一种去中心化货币市场协议，可在 Polkadot 生态系统中提供跨链交易、借贷、质押挖矿和流动性挖矿服务。
items.description_en: Parallel Finance is a Decentralized Money Market Protocol that offers cross-chain transfer, lending, staking, and liquidity farming in the Polkadot ecosystem.

items.name: Rage.Trade
items.description_ch: Rage.Trade 是一个Arbitrum上的去中心化 ETH 永续合约交易所，和USDC生息平台。通过一个 Delta Neutral Vaults 实现对冲的USDC质押挖矿，通过一个 80-20 Vaults 实现流动性挖矿，通过 Uniswap V3 的 vAMM 和循环流动性实现最高5倍杠杆的ETH永续合约交易。
items.description_en: Rage Trade is building the most liquid ETH Perp and the best USDC farm on Arbitrum. It supports USDC staking through a Delta Neutral Vaults, liquidity mining through an 80-20 Vaults, and ETH perpetual contract trading with up to 5x leverage through Uniswap V3's vAMM and recycled liquidity.

items.name: Aave
items.description_ch: Aave 是一种用于去中心化、可跨链借贷的开源流动性协议。它以与提供的资产 1:1 的比例铸造符合 ERC20 标准的 aTokens。用户将通过供应、借贷和质押来赚取 APR。
items.description_en: Aave is an open-source liquidity protocol for decentralized cross-chain lending and borrowing. It mints ERC20-compliant aTokens at a 1:1 ratio to supplied assets. Users will earn APRs by supplying, borrowing and staking.

items.name: Abracadabra
items.description_ch: Abracadabra 专注于使生息资产具有流动性。它允许您使用您最喜欢的数字资产作为抵押品来借入稳定币$MIM。同时它还支持杠杆交易和质押挖矿。
items.description_en: Abracadabra specializes in making interest-bearing assets liquid. It allows you to use your favorite digital asset as collateral to borrow $MIM, a kind of stablecoin. At the same time, it also supports leveraged trading and staking.

items.name: Oasis.app(MakerDAO)
items.description_ch: Oasis.app是一个由MakerDAO团队开发的去中心化金融平台，提供了多种功能，包括借贷、交易和质押挖矿等。
items.description_en: Oasis.app is a decentralized financial platform developed by the MakerDAO team that provides a variety of functions, including lending, trading, and staking.

items.name: Venus Protocol
items.description_ch: Venus 是一个 DeFi 借贷平台，允许用户借出和借入基于抵押的加密货币，并赚取APY。同时它也支持兑换和质押挖矿。
items.description_en: Venus is a DeFi lending platform that allows users to lend and borrow cryptocurrency based on collateralization to earn APY. It also support swapping and staking.

items.name: Justlend
items.description_ch: JustLend 是一个基于 TRON 的去中心化借贷协议。用户可通过供应来赚取APY。
items.description_en: JustLend is a TRON-based decentralized lending protocol. Users earn APY by supplying.

items.name: Liquity
items.description_ch: Liquity 是一种去中心化的借贷协议，允许您以 Ether 作为抵押品获得 0% 的利息贷款。贷款以 LUSD 支付——一种与美元挂钩的稳定币，并且需要保持最低抵押率仅为 110%。两种赚钱方式： 1）将 LUSD 存入稳定池，赚取清算收益和 LQTY 奖励。 2）质押LQTY，赚取发行费（LUSD）和赎回费（ETH）的收益。
items.description_en: Liquity is a decentralized borrowing protocol that allows you to draw 0% interest loans against Ether used as collateral. Loans are paid out in LUSD - a USD pegged stablecoin, and need to maintain a minimum collateral ratio of only 110%. Two ways to earn: 1) Deposit LUSD to the Stability Pool and earn liquidation gains and LQTY rewards. 2) Stake LQTY and earn the revenue from issuance fees (in LUSD) and redemption fees (in ETH).

items.name: Morpho
items.description_ch: Morpho 是位于借贷池之上的链上点对点（P2P）层。借款人和贷方的利率无缝提高，同时保留相同的担保。
items.description_en: Morpho is an on-chain peer-to-peer(P2P) layer on top of lending pools. Rates are seamlessly improved for borrowers and lenders while preserving the same guarantees.

items.name: Euler
items.description_ch: Euler 是以太坊上的一种非托管、无需许可的借贷协议，可帮助用户在不需要受信任的第三方的情况下就其加密资产赚取利息或对冲波动的市场。它还支持衍生品交易，杠杆交易，质押挖矿。
items.description_en: Euler is a non-custodial permissionless lending protocol on Ethereum that helps users to earn interest on their crypto assets or hedge against volatile markets without the need for a trusted third-party. It also supports derivatives trading, leveraged trading, staking and so on.

items.name: BendDao
items.description_ch: 使用您的 NFT 作为抵押品借入 ETH 或存入 ETH 并立即赚取收益。它支持质押挖矿、锁定挖矿、流动性挖矿和闪电贷。
items.description_en: Use your NFTs as collateral to borrow ETH or deposit your ETH and earn yields instantly. It features staking, locking, liquidity mining and flash loans.

items.name: Compound Finance
items.description_ch: Compound 是一个去中心化的基于智能合约的借贷协议。当提供稳定资产时能有一个不错的收益率。
items.description_en: Compound is a decentralized smart contract-based lending protocol. You can earn a good APR when supplying stable tokens.

items.name: Beefy Finance
items.description_ch: Beefy 是一种去中心化的多链收益优化器，允许用户通过加密赚取复利。它旨在通过流动性挖矿和质押挖矿为用户赢得最高的 APY。
items.description_en: Beefy is a decentralized, multichain yield optimizer that allows users to earn compound interest on crypto. It aims to earn users the highest APYs by liquidity mining and staking.

items.name: Convex
items.description_ch: Convex 是一个通过简单且用户友好的界面为 CRV 利益相关者和流动性提供者增加奖励的收益聚合器。它支持流动性挖矿、质押挖矿和锁定挖矿。
items.description_en: Convex is a yield aggregator that boosts rewards for CRV stakers and liquidity providers through a simple and user-friendly interface. It supports liquidity farming, staking and locking.

items.name: Yearn Finance
items.description_ch: Yearn 是为去中心化金融投资者提供的聚合服务，使用自动化让他们从收益农场中获得最大利润。
items.description_en: Yearn is an aggregator service for decentralized finance investors, using automation to allow them to maximize profits from yield farming.

items.name: Aura
items.description_ch: Aura Finance 是一个建立在 Balancer 系统之上的协议，通过 BAL 存款和 Aura 的原生代币的社交聚合，为 Balancer 流动性提供者和 BAL 质押者（进入 veBAL）提供最大的激励。支持质押挖矿、流动性挖矿和锁定挖矿。
items.description_en: Aura Finance is a protocol built on top of the Balancer system to provide maximum incentives to Balancer liquidity providers and BAL stakers (into veBAL) through social aggregation of BAL deposits and Aura's native token. It supports staking, liquidity mining and locking.

items.name: Alpaca
items.description_ch: BSC 上的第一个杠杆收益农业协议。为去中心化金融投资者提供的聚合服务，让他们自动地从收益农场中获得最大利润。支持借贷，流动性挖矿，质押挖矿，锁定挖矿等功能。
items.description_en: The 1st leveraged yield farming protocol on BSC. An aggregation service for decentralized financial investors, allowing them to automatically maximize profits from yield farming. Support lending, liquidity mining, staking, locking and other functions.

items.name: GMD
items.description_ch: GMD 是一个基于GMX的衍生品收益聚合器。它提供质押挖矿和流动性挖矿等服务。
items.description_en: GMD is a derivatives yield aggregator built on top of GMX. It provides services such as staking and liquidity mining.

items.name: Lido
items.description_ch: Lido 是目前 TVL 最高的去中心化 ETH 2.0 质押平台。用户可将任意数量的 ETH 质押到 Lido 上换取等额的 stETH 作为流动性，同时赚取 APR。
items.description_en: Lido is a decentralized ETH2.0 staking platform with the highest TVL. Users can stake any amount of ETH to Lido in exchange for an equivalent amount of stETH as liquidity and earn APR at the same time.

items.name: Rocket Pool
items.description_ch: Rocket Pool 是一个去中心化的 ETH 2.0 权益证明（Proof-of-Stake）质押平台。用户可将最少0.01ETH质押到Rocket Pool上换取等额的rETH作为流动性，同时赚取APR。
items.description_en: Rocket Pool is a decentralized ETH2.0 Proof-of-Stake staking platform. Users can stake at least 0.01ETH to Rocket Pool in exchange for an equivalent amount of rETH as liquidity and earn APR at the same time.

items.name: Ankr
items.description_ch: 快速、最可靠、流动性强、安全且易于集成的质押基础设施。支持质押挖矿，流动性质押，和跨链兑换。
items.description_en: Fast, most reliable, liquid, secure, and easy to integrate staking infrastructure. It supports staking, liquidity staking, and cross-chain transfer.

items.name: Coinbase Warpped Staked ETH
items.description_ch: Coinbase 允许质押 ETH 的客户接收名为 Coinbase Wrapped Staked ETH（“cbETH”）的 ERC20 实用代币，这是他们质押的 ETH 的流动性凭证。
items.description_en: Coinbase is allowing customers who stake ETH to receive an ERC20 utility token called Coinbase Wrapped Staked ETH (“cbETH”), which is a liquid representation of their staked-ETH.

items.name: Frax Finance
items.description_ch: Frax 协议引入了部分由抵押品支持、部分由算法稳定的加密货币概念AMO（Algorithmic Market Orders）。该平台提供交易、借贷、流动性挖矿、质押挖矿、锁定挖矿等功能。
items.description_en: The Frax Protocol introduced the concept of a cryptocurrency being partially backed by collateral and partially stabilized algorithmically, AMO (Algorithmic Market Orders). The platform provides functions such as transactions, lending, liquidity farming, staking, and locking.

items.name: SSV.network
items.description_ch: ssv.network 是一个完全去中心化的开源 ETH 质押网络，基于秘密共享验证器 (SSV) 技术，也称为分布式验证器技术 (DVT)。
items.description_en: ssv.network is a fully decentralized, open-source ETH staking network, based on Secret Shared Validator (SSV) technology, which is also known as Distributed Validator Technology (DVT).

items.name: Juststables
items.description_ch: JustStable 是一个基于TRON的去中心化稳定币协议。其稳定币USDJ的特点包括价值稳定、去中心化、快速、低成本的交易、高度透明和支持多种应用场景等。
items.description_en: JustStable is a TRON-based decentralized stablecoin protocol. The features of its stablecoin USDJ include stable value, decentralization, fast and low-cost transactions, high transparency and support for multiple application scenarios, etc.

items.name: MakerDAO
items.description_ch: Maker 是以太坊上的一个 DAO，旨在将其稳定币 (Dai) 相对于 IMF 国际货币篮子 SDR 的价格波动降至最低。
items.description_en: Maker is a DAO on Ethereum seeking to minimize price volatility for its own stablecoin (the Dai) against IMF’s international currency basket SDR.

items.name: Synthetix
items.description_ch: Synthetix 是一种衍生品（合成资产）流动性协议，为 DeFi 中的衍生品（合成资产）交易提供了支柱。它支持衍生品交易、最高25倍杠杆的永续合约、质押挖矿和借贷。
items.description_en: Synthetix is a derivatives(synthetic assets) liquidity protocol providing the backbone for derivatives(synthetic assets) trading in DeFi. It supports derivatives trading, perpetual contracts with up to 25x leverage, staking and lending.

items.name: OpenSea
items.description_ch: OpenSea 是加密收藏品和 NFT 的 P2P 市场。它包括收藏品、游戏物品和其他由区块链支持的虚拟商品。
items.description_en: OpenSea is a P2P marketplace for crypto collectibles and NFTs. It includes collectibles, gaming items, and other virtual goods backed by a blockchain.

items.name: LooksRare
items.description_ch: LooksRare 是下一代 NFT 市场，用户可以在其中买卖和持有 NFT。它的奖励回馈平台的用户和创建者。
items.description_en: LooksRare is a next-generation NFT market where users can buy, sell, and hold NFTs. Its rewards give back to the users and creators of the platform.

items.name: Axie Infinity
items.description_ch: Sky Mavis 是一家创建 dapp 和服务的技术公司。它专注于 IT、区块链、视频游戏等领域。
items.description_en: Sky Mavis is a technology company that creates dapps and services. It specialize in the fields of IT, blockchain, video game, and more.
